nodes.text: Enhanced Menace of Darth Maul is an expansion card set of the Young Jedi Collectible Card Game, produced by Decipher and released on August 2, 2000. The set is based on the original Menace of Darth Maul set. This set introduced a new "wild card" mechanic, wherein you have a "white deckbuilding" dot that could replace one colored deckbuilding dot. You could only have 1 white dot per color, and limited to 6 wild cards in a 60-card deck. This set contained wild cards from various scenes in the movie, and the packs contained boosters from the Menace of Darth Maul set.
P6 Trade Federation Tank, Assault Leader
